summary: Ever wanted to fight one off the new dragons from Dawngard but didn\'t want to go around with your warrior and start casting magic or pickpocketing people? Well then try this mod out
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to fight one off the new dragons from Dawngard but didn\'t want to go around with your warrior and start casting magic or pickpocketing people? Well then this mod is for you: this de-levels dragons but doesn\'t do it randomly, you can fight a legendary dragon at level 10 but the chance of that hapening is small, but it raises with your level.

_________________________________________________________________________________________
Level/Dragon| Dragon | Blood | Frost | Elder| Ancient | Revenant | Legendary |
        1-17     |      5%     |   35%  |  25%  | 15%  |     10%   |       5%     |       5%     |
        17-26   |      5%      |    5%  |  35%  | 25%  |     15%   |       10%    |       5%     |
        27-35   |      5%      |    5%  |  5%    | 35% |      25%  |       15%     |     10%    |
        36-44   |      5%      |    5%  |  5%    | 10% |      35%  |       25%    |       15%    |
        45-58   |      0%     |    5%   |   5%   | 10% |     25%   |       40%    |       15%    |
        59-77   |      0%     |    0%   | 5%     | 10% |     15%   |       25%    |       45%    |
         >77    |      0%     |    0%    | 0%    | 10% |     15%   |       25%    |       50%    |
Version History:

1.0 Initial Release




Known Issues and Compatability:

None that i know but if u use a mod that changes dragons leveled list remember: the last loaded is the one that is used so if u wnat to use this load it last.




Future Plans:
 
Probably make a version that doesn\'t need Dawnguard, maybe a hard and hardcore version that spawns 2 and 3 tier above player level, other than that sugestions are acepted
author: Dean Contreras
